about_the_game:
Happy Halloween! This set contains all costumes in the Halloween 2015 set.
This set contains one costume each for 34 characters.

This set contains costumes for the following characters:
All characters in DOA5LR
*You must have the latest update installed before using this content.

Akira, Sarah, Pai, Jacky characters ©SEGA.Virtua Fighter is either a registered trademark or trademark of SEGA Corporation.

©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

Happy Halloween! This set contains all costumes in the Halloween 2015 set. This set contains one costume each for 34 characters. This set contains costumes for the following characters: All characters in DOA5LR *You must have the latest update installed before using this content. Akira, Sarah, Pai, Jacky characters ©SEGA.Virtua Fighter is either a registered trademark or trademark of SEGA Corporation. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

subs.option_text: DOA5LR DLC Halloween 2015 Costume Set - $29.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over

oflc.descriptors: Violence, sexualised imagery and nudity, online interactivity

pegi.descriptors: Violence, sexual and online gameplay with other people.
